dsl.content: 1 ]ρ[ -1 desc., (ε, ϲ), (η, κ) 2 ][][ -1 (ο, ϲ), inf. arcus sicut β, ε, θ, ο, ϲ, vert. 3 ][ -1 (κ, χ, υ), sup. vert. vel desc. 4 ][]ν̣πο[ -1 sup. vert., (λ, κ) 5 ][]α[ -1 vert., (α, λ, δ), duo vert. 6 η̣ι[ -1 inf. arcus 7 ][ sup. arcus vel arcus ]ι inf. vert. apicata 8 δ̣[ inf. vest. ] inf. arcus, sin. inf. arcus 9 ]ν̣ν dext. inf. desc. vel arcus, dext. inf. vest. 11 ο (θ, ε) ⟦ου⟧ lineolis horiz. et ⸌ω⸍ supra lineam addito del. librarius 12 ιωνδιτ[]ο̣υϲυ̣ (τ, π), (α, λ, δ), (ο, ω), sup. horiz. et med. vest., sin. inf. vert. 13 ][ inf. vest. 15 [ vert., sup. asc. vel arcus ][ desc. sicut α, λ, δ 16 ][ (ο, ϲ) 17 ][ inf. desc.
